p: According to the qRT-PCR results, Figure 9 reports that the maximum up-regulated expression level of CL 1294 gene exhibits 8.32 fold changes in mRNA in S. oryzae adult treated with (6 mg/cm 2) of L. angustifolia EO for 2 h, followed by 4.76 at 10 ppm malathion after 2 h and the minimum expression level reached 2.08 fold in adult insect treated with (6 mg/cm 2) concentration of N. sativa EO for 1 h as compared with reference gene (housekeeping gene, Î²-Actin).
